attributes.action: Force Cadbury's to bring back the wispa chocolate bar.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want to put pressure on Cadburys to bring back the faithful WISPA chocolate. The Aero is a poor mans WISPA and the Dairy Milk bubbly isn't worth mentioning.
BRING BACK THE WISPA, THE WISPA GOLD & THE WISPA BITE. 
At the very least a token guesture on Cadbury's behalf to bring a limited edition version back to sale.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
